article_title: Employers Bemoan ACA's Costs But They Are Not Dropping Coverage

article_metadata.description: Though employers say the Affordable Care Act has certainly increased the cost of providing benefits to their workers, not even 1 percent plan to discontinue health benefits, according to a new survey. A new analysis out this week from the International Foundation of Employee Benefit Plans isn’t good news for workers [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
